data.name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Introducing the always-serious but never-not-funny soundtrack to the second Darkside Detective installment, composed by Thomas O'Boyle. Everywhere you turn while exploring the cursed world of Twin Lakes will bring you new excitement and intrigue.

Featuring:
- 80s John Carpenter influences
- Wrestling themes
- Power ballads
- A trip to Ireland
- Elements of horror
- Detective drama flavor a la Twin Peaks (the slightly pointier and potentially more cursed version of Twin Lakes)
- and much more!
data.about_the_game:
Introducing the always-serious but never-not-funny soundtrack to the second Darkside Detective installment, composed by Thomas O'Boyle. Everywhere you turn while exploring the cursed world of Twin Lakes will bring you new excitement and intrigue.

Featuring:
- 80s John Carpenter influences
- Wrestling themes
- Power ballads
- A trip to Ireland
- Elements of horror
- Detective drama flavor a la Twin Peaks (the slightly pointier and potentially more cursed version of Twin Lakes)
- and much more!
data.short_description: Delouse your room with sage and pack up your travel-sized ouija board, it’s time to re-enter Twin Lakes - America’s 34th most haunted city. Join Detective McQueen as he puzzles his way through 6 chilling cases, risking life and pixelated limb to solve the macabre mysteries that plague the poor town.
